segments.text: Hello , Mr Mayhew . How are you today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm just fine , thanks , Jane . I'd like to make a withdrawal from my Current Account , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you like a balance inquiry first , Mr Mayhew ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That might be a good idea , yes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Your balance is 21,290 RIB . How much would you like to take out today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think 2,000 RIB will suffice , thanks .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Actually , I have a suggestion for you . We've started a new service called Entrusting Deposit Combination - Have you heard about this ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I don't think I have . But I would like to hear the full details , if you think it'll be beneficial to me .
segments.speaker: S2
